long_description: true omni helps companies engage with customers through an omnichannel marketing strategy. we provide kiosk, digital signage & mobile marketing solutions and integrate with existing channels through a cloud-based platform. we focus on customer experience, data analytics, productivity and revenue. our mission is to deliver a result-driven contactless solution that builds vision and value to the travel, hospitality, retail, and health industry. what we have created was not an overnight success. it was full of struggle and letdowns, long nights, and hard work. but it was the desire of everyone in this company to keep going, to get better, and to learn that got us to this point.
